== Title ==

MR Image Intensity Bias Field Correction

== Description ==

This program corrects intensity inhomogeneity artifacts in MR images using a bias field estimated via entropy minimization.

== Syntax ==

: <tt>[options] InputImage OutputImage </tt>

where

; <tt>InputImage</tt> : Input image path

; <tt>OutputImage</tt> : Output image path

== List of Supported Options ==

; <tt>--verbose</tt> / <tt>-v</tt> : Be verbose
; <tt>--write-float</tt> / <tt>-F</tt> : Write output image with floating point pixel data. If this is not given, the input data type is used.
=== Bias Field Parameterization ===

; <tt>--degree-add</tt> <tt><integer></tt> / <tt>-A</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Polynomial degree for additive correction.
; <tt>--degree-mul</tt> <tt><integer></tt> / <tt>-M</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Polynomial degree for multiplicative correction.
; <tt>--incremental</tt> / <tt>-I</tt> : Incrementally increase polynomial degrees.
=== Input Image Preprocessing ===

; <tt>--mask</tt> <tt><labelmap-path></tt> / <tt>-m</tt> <tt><labelmap-path></tt> : Binary mask image filename.
; <tt>--thresh-min</tt> <tt><float></tt> / <tt>-t</tt> <tt><float></tt> : Minimum intensity threshold for image foreground.
; <tt>--thresh-max</tt> <tt><float></tt> / <tt>-T</tt> <tt><float></tt> : Minimum intensity threshold for image foreground.
=== Entropy Estimation Settings ===

; <tt>--log-intensities</tt> / <tt>-L</tt> : Use log intensities for entropy estimation.
; <tt>--sampling-density</tt> <tt><float></tt> / <tt>-s</tt> <tt><float></tt> : Image sampling density to use only subset of image pixels
; <tt>--num-bins</tt> <tt><integer></tt> / <tt>-n</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Number of histogram bins for entropy estimation
=== Optimization Algorithm Settings ===

; <tt>--step-max</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Maximum (initial) search step size.
; <tt>--step-min</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Minimum (final) search step size.
=== Import and Output of Bias Fields ===

; <tt>--import-bias-add</tt> <tt><image-path></tt> : Import additive bias field (disables optimization).
; <tt>--import-bias-mul</tt> <tt><image-path></tt> : Import multiplicative bias field (disables optimization).
; <tt>--write-bias-add</tt> <tt><image-path></tt> : File name for output of additive bias field.
; <tt>--write-bias-mul</tt> <tt><image-path></tt> : File name for output of multiplicative bias field.
